qas.question: When did more commercial streets become built in Nanjing?
What has happened as the result of more commercial streets in Nanjing?

answers.text: the nightlife has become more diverse

qas.question: What area has lots of types of recreational outlets?
Other than at "Nanjing 1912", where else are there a lot of bars?

answers.text: along Shanghai road and its neighbourhood

qas.question: The two areas with a lot of bars are popular with whom?

context: <a0_0>In the past 20 years<a0_0/>, several commercial streets have been developed, hence <a1_0>the nightlife has become more diverse<a1_0/>: there are shopping malls opening late in the Xinjiekou CBD and Hunan Road. The well-established <a2_0>"Nanjing 1912"<a2_0/> district hosts a wide variety of recreational facilities ranging from traditional restaurants and western pubs to dance clubs. There are two major areas where bars are densely located; one is in 1912 block; the other is <a3_0>along Shanghai road and its neighbourhood<a3_0/>. Both are popular with <a4_0>international residents of the city<a4_0/>.
